name: Ode al Rumore (2017)
description: Ode al rumore (ode to noise) is a visual glitch poem I included in my work the Artist is Noise presented at the Wrong Biennale in 2017 in the pavilion GFX Free Error- The Wrong New Digital Art Biennale Istanbul curated by Haydi Roket. The event took place afk at GFX Free Error @ SPACE DEBRIS, The WRONG EMBASSY TURKEY. Today, 09/09/2021, I gift this dirty new media work to 99 members of the Hic Et Nunc community to  celebrate my birthday.
